cause.description:
for the past couple of years there has been skateboarders and bikers in kingsville and no were to ride... but when we find places to ride the cops always come and harass us and we are tired of it so we are starting a petition on facebook for kingsville to get a skate park
1. kingsville needs a skatepark
2. no were to skate or bike
3. tired of being harassed by the OPP
cause.mission: for kingsville to get a skatepark
cause.name: kingsville should get a skatepark
